doc.title: My Carnival
doc.plot: A kid doing his homework: he writes "On carnival mom bought me a Robocop costume..." Elsewhere a car stops in front of a building: two gangsters enter, climb up the stairs and break into an apartment. Inside, there is a transvestite and his pimp. Guns in hand, the gangsters interrogate them, but the two just shake with fear. A macabre nursery rhyme is recited to decide who's going to be tortured first. After the confession a large packet of drugs is found. The gangsters have no pity for the two. The child's narration now meets the present: we see the little Robocop on the same building staircase as the two gangsters who pass in front of him and accidentally drop a gun near the child. Mistaking reality for a game, little Robocop takes action.
